change.changenote: Section 1 definitions of "anti-discrimination measures", "board", "conflict of interest", "director of discipline", "discipline panel", "discipline panel member", "discipline tribunal", "discrimination", "governance activity", "Indigenous governing body", "Indigenous peoples", "Indigenous practices", "performance standards", "regulator", "regulatory college", "regulatory performance", "regulatory process", "superintendent" and "superintendent's office" were brought into force by 2023-43-1(part), effective October 23, 2023 (BC Reg 221/2023).
Section 2 was brought into force by 2023-43-2, effective October 23, 2023 (BC Reg 221/2023).
Section 9 (1) (a) was brought into force by 2023-43-9(1)(a), effective October 23, 2023 (BC Reg 221/2023).
Section 14 (2) and (3) were brought into force by 2023-43-14(2),(3), effective October 23, 2023 (BC Reg 221/2023).
Section 15 (1) and (2) were brought into force by 2023-43-15(1),(2), effective October 23, 2023 (BC Reg 221/2023).
Sections 435 to 439 were brought into force by 2022-43-435 to 439, effective October 23, 2023 (BC Reg 221/2023).
Sections 441 to 449 were brought into force by 2022-43-441 to 449, effective October 23, 2023 (BC Reg 221/2023).
Section 450 (1) was brought into force by 2022-43-450(1), effective October 23, 2023 (BC Reg 221/2023).
Sections 451 to 454 were brought into force by 2022-43-451 to 454, effective October 23, 2023 (BC Reg 221/2023).
Section 467 (2) was brought into force by 2022-43-467(2), effective October 23, 2023 (BC Reg 221/2023).
Section 485 was brought into force by 2022-43-485, effective October 23, 2023 (BC Reg 221/2023).
Section 486 (1) (a), (c), and (d) and (2), was brought into force by 2022-43-486(1)(a),(c),(d),(2), effective October 23, 2023 (BC Reg 221/2023).
Section 487 was brought into force by 2022-43-487, effective October 23, 2023 (BC Reg 221/2023).
Section 489 was brought into force by 2022-43-489, effective October 23, 2023 (BC Reg 221/2023).
Section 545 was brought into force by 2022-43-545, effective October 23, 2023 (BC Reg 221/2023).
